title: Marvel NOW Week 87 (7-16-2014) (darkhomr) [ALL]
description:
Welcome to the 2014 version of Marvel NOW!  Week after week I will be bringing you the latest in comics in the Marvel NOW universe as well as the All-New Marvel NOW stories.  Can you believe we are 84 weeks in the Marvel NOW and they are putting out an ALL NEW version of the titles?  What will NOT be included is Disney stuff, TV stuff, Ultimate Universe, and kids books. Those will be included (when available) in my Total Marvel pack.



This weeks' release (July 16, 2014) includes 17 issues with 1 new #1s (100th Anniversary Special #1 X-Men)




My release packs are as follows: 


DC Universe 52 (Wednesdays based on scanners release times, but not later than Friday morning)
Marvel NOW! (Marvel Comics in the NOW! universe will be released Wednesdays, based on scanners release times)
Total Marvel (All Marvel Universe comics, released on Friday, based on scanners release times)
Independent Comics (Non-DC Universe and Major Independent comics, released between Sunday and Monday morning) 
Total DC (all DC comics released for the current week.  Released by Saturday each week.  Does not include digital only releases)
DC Monthly (all DC Universe comics for the month, released the first Friday after the end of the month)
Total Marvel Monthly (all Marvel Universe comics, released the first Tuesday after the end of the month)


NOtE:  Neither Deapool:  Dracula's Gauntlet #1 or #2 have been released as of the release of this pack.  They will be included in whichever pack is available after they are scanned.

100th Anniversary Special #1 X-Men (7/16/2014 CBR)

CLASSIFIED 

All New X-Factor #11 (7/16/2014 CBR)

X-Factor brings big trouble to Serval IndustriesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦heavily-armed trouble. Gambit's indiscretion is found out. Nobody is happy. 

Avengers World #9 (7/16/2014 CBR)

Cannonball and Sunspot have twenty-four hours in the future to find the help the Avengers need. They're just gonna stop for a drink first. 

Elektra #4 (7/16/2014 CBR)

After escaping the ruins of Shicheng, Elektra corners the elusive Cape Crow at the edge of the world where she must finally decide his fate. Will the deadliest assassin in the Marvel Universe defeat Cape Crow and collect the biggest bounty of her career, or help the hardened killer and his son escape the psychotic assassin Bloody Lips? 

Magneto #7 (7/16/2014 CBR)

Magneto is on a one-man mission to safeguard the future of mutantkind by any means necessary. So far, he's done so by eliminating human threatsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦But what happens when it's MUTANTS who pose a threat to their own species? Will Magneto cross a line and raise his hand to his own kind? And if so, just how far will he go? 

Ms Marvel #6 (7/16/2014 CBR)

On the run from the Inventor, Kamala needs all the help she can get. Did someone say Wolverine? 

Nova #19 (7/16/2014 CBR)

ORIGINAL SIN tie-in! Original Sin presents a pair of mysteries: Was Nova's father a murderer? What is the secret origin of the Black Novas? As Sam grieves for The Watcher, he turns to a friend for help -- Rocket Raccoon! 

Original Sin #3.2 (7/16/2014 CBR)

EVERYBODY HAS ONE... 

Original Sin #6 (of 8) (7/16/2014 CBR)

CLASSIFIED

Savage Hulk #2 (7/16/2014 CBR)

While HULK and ABOMINATION have the clash of the centuryÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Ã¢â‚¬Â¦the X-MEN do the Monster Mash! And PROFESSOR X plans toÃ¢â‚¬Â¦terminate the Hulk?!? 

Savage Wolverine #21 (7/16/2014 CBR)

MAN OF WAR - Part One! In the midst of World War I, Logan leads a daring missionÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and discovers he isn't the only mutant at war! B.P.R.D.'s John Arcudi returns to Marvel with Joe Quinones (FF) for an epic that uncovers more of Logan's tortured past! 

Secret Avengers #5 (7/16/2014 CBR)

'THE DROP' Death on the Helicarrier. The killer is at large. Hill leads the investigation. Another incident on board. No-one expects a proper acid bath. Coulson goes rogue. Hawkeye wonders. Spider-Woman talks with a new friend. 

She-hulk #6 (7/16/2014 CBR)

Last issue, someone important to She-Hulk was killed - and she won't let it stand. But the mysterious blue file turns friend into foe, who can she trust? Charles Soule and Ron Wemberly continue the All New Marvel Now hit everyone's talking about! 

Silver Surfer #4 (7/16/2014 CBR)

In order to return alien abductee Dawn Greenwood home, the Surfer must travel to the one place in the galaxy he dreads the most... Planet Earth! Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And what should be a quick drop off turns into turns into one very... strange adventure. Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Featuring: DOCTOR STRANGE, THE INCREDIBLE HULK, and some surprise guest stars. Including those movie stars on the cover! 

Thunderbolts #28 (7/16/2014 CBR)

THE PUNISHER vs. THE THUNDERBOLTS, PART TWO As Frank moves in to take out his former alliesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Another former Thunderbolt closes in on them both! 

Uncanny X-Men #23 (7/16/2014 CBR)

CLASSIFIED 

X-Men #16 (7/16/2014 CBR)

The Future has come callingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and he wants his son Shogo back! But will Jubilee and the X-Men let their bouncing baby boy go without a fight? Spoiler alert: HELL NO!
